description: Ensure fieldsets provide a legend to group related controls.
recommendation: Add a <legend> element as the first child of each <fieldset>. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.3.1,3.3.2)
algorithm: Flags <fieldset> elements whose legend is missing or empty.
algorithm_advanced: Regex-matches <fieldset> blocks and reports when <legend> is missing or empty.
